title: Minecraft 主机版 TU69/1.77(1.76)/Patch 38(水域更新)发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1345979462 于 2018-9-22 18:54 编辑 
主机版即Xbox 360，Xbox One版，PlayStation 3/4/Vita版，WiiU版，Switch版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。
迎接新的正式版吧！
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

https://www.minecraftforum.net/f ... 4-patch-change-logs

Change log for Patch 1.77 - September 17th 2018
Fixed a number of player reported crashes that can occur while playing the game.修复一些玩家报告的游戏崩溃问题

（水域更新）Change log for Patch 1.76 - September 11th 2018/Patch 38/TU69

Added the Update Aquatic! The oceans of Minecraft are now teeming with new life!水域更新！现在新生物在海洋中遨游！Added 6 new Trophies!增加6种奖杯Added Shipwrecks, Underwater Ruins, Coral Reefs, Icebergs, Underwater Caves/Ravines, and Buried Treasure to world generation.增加世界生成结构：沉船，水下遗迹，珊瑚礁，冰山，水下洞穴，埋藏宝藏Added new blocks: Coral, Dried Kelp, Sea Pickles, Sea Turtle Eggs, Stripped Logs, Blue Ice, Prismarine Stairs, and Prismarine Slabs.新方块：珊瑚，干海带块，海泡菜，海龟蛋，去皮木头，蓝冰，海晶石台阶和半砖Added new Kelp and Sea Grass underwater flora.在海底平面上增加海带和海草Added Trapdoors, Pressure Plates, and Buttons for every type of wood.增加各种类型原木制成的活板门，压力板和按钮Added Bubble Columns that are created by underwater Magma or Soul Sand. Bubble Columns push players and mobs to the surface, or drag them under!增加用岩浆块或灵魂沙构成的气泡柱，它可以将玩家或其他生物带到海面上，或让他们沉下去Added the Conduit, a block that provides underwater players with a powerful Status Effect.增加潮涌核心，可以为水下的玩家提供有力的效果加成Added Tridents, and their unique enchantments; Impaling, Channeling, Riptide, and Loyalty.增加三叉戟和它的专用附魔：穿刺，引雷，激流，忠诚Added other new items: Dried Kelp, Fish Buckets, Turtle Shell Helmet, Heart of the Sea, Nautilus Shell, Scute, and Phantom Membrane.增加其他新物品：干海带，鱼桶，海龟壳，海洋之心，鹦鹉螺壳，鳞甲，幻翼膜Added new Potions and Arrows of the Turtle Master, and of Slow Falling.增加新药水和箭矢：神龟和缓降Added Buried Treasure Explorer Maps that will lead you to great wealth hidden under the sands!增加藏宝图，带领你发现海底埋藏的宝藏Added Cod, Salmon, Pufferfish, and 2700 types of Tropical Fish!增加鳕鱼、鲑鱼、河豚和2700多种热带鱼Added the Dolphin, a friendly mob that helps players out!增加海豚，可以帮助玩家的友善生物Added the Phantom, a mob that hunts down tired players.增加幻翼，攻击疲劳的玩家Added the Sea Turtle, a mob that travels the world but always returns home.增加海龟，在世界中环游但总是会回到出发点的生物Added the Drowned, a monster that attacks players that enter their underwater domain.增加溺尸，攻击进入水中的玩家Added new Warm, Lukewarm, and Cold Ocean biomes to hold all this new stuff...增加新的温带，寒温带和冻洋等生物群系来容纳这些新东西...And a new Tutorial world to show you how to use it!新的教程世界来教你怎么玩！



外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）4JStudios的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）官方更新日志（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）

replies.author: 呆瓜Domado
replies.txt_content: 主机板的更新好像比PC慢多了

话说这是原主机版吗？

前段时间enwiki有个搞破坏的差点让我搞混淆了。

replies.author: z427
replies.txt_content: 已经玩上一阵子啦 变化超大 水里再也不是光秃秃的了 栅栏和半砖也能和水融在一起了
